author: mikeshardmind(Sinbad)
name: General
short: A replacement of the general cog with only a custom roll function.
description: A replacement of the general cog with only a custom roll function.
install_message: This cog replaces the General cog in Red (I only care about the roll command) This cog features some math. For optimal use, you'll want the `numba` and `scipy` libraries installed, though this will work without them.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
